headline: US rig count down four as prices slip
summary: The rig count in the Permian Basin was up one this week, the latest count Friday by Baker Hughes shows, with 251 rigs active in the region. A year ago, 303 rigs were active in the region. Nationally, the oil and gas rig count is down four from last week at 546 rigs. A year ago, 585 rigs were active. The count shows that 414 rigs sought oil, down six from the previous week, and 125 explored for ...

headline: Assessing Baker Hughes (BKR) Valuation Following Strong 31% One-Year Share Price Growth
summary: Baker Hughes (BKR) shares have seen modest changes lately, but longer-term performance tells a different story. Over the past year, the stock has climbed 31%, outpacing many peers in the energy sector. See our latest analysis for Baker Hughes. This year’s strong run builds on a pattern of momentum for Baker Hughes. The company’s 1-year total shareholder return has reached almost 31%, and its share price continues to move higher, including an impressive 11% increase over the last three months...
